comments:
Build 20020624

1) Start the workbench
2) Create a project
3) Create a txt file.
4) Create a .readme file using the "new wizard".
5) Close the txt file (only the .reamd file would be opened).
6) Change preference to use Emacs.
7) Exit/restart workspace (not sure if this steps is needed).
8) Open the txt file.

You will get the dialog "Error occurred. See log file".
After this error the underline of the Window menu is not removed anymore on an 
editor is activated and the underlines are not added to any menu when a view is 
activated.

The log file has the following exception:

Already fixed. API to get the text was added to MenuManager and 
EditorMenuManager$Overrides is getting the text from the menu manager instead 
of the MenuItem which may be disposed.
Verified using original steps in I20021017.
